## MainWeb.DefaultGridLineColor property

获取或设置默认网格线的颜色。

```csharp
public Color DefaultGridLineColor { get; set; }
```

### 例子

```csharp
[C#]
	GridWeb1.DefaultGridLineColor = Color.Red;

[Visual Basic]
	GridWeb1.DefaultGridLineColor = Color.Red
```
